name: Air Conditioning
description: Efficiency Heating & Cooling is the go-to HVAC contractor that has stocked and ready service vehicles for AC repair! I get to you fast, and ready for any type of air conditioning repair.

name: Security Systems
description: I Provide high-performance infrared and dual technology sensors that complement the suite of outdoor intrusion detection solutions and are ideal as an additional security layering strategy.

name: Air Conditioning
description: I can also replace or repair heat pumps, ductless mini splits, humidifiers, programmable thermostats. Whatever your heating and cooling needs are Efficiency Heating & Cooling can handle them all.

name: Electrical Service
